title: Evidence for the Ice Age
creator_credit: Charles L. Finance, Stanley Croner and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Explains how anomalous geological formations such as moraines and erratics, polished and straited rocks, resulting from glacial action, show that much of the temperate area has been under ice sheets. For schools.
creator_credit_for_label: Charles L. Finance, Stanley Croner and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
